info.official_title: Systemic Application of Cadonilimab, LM-302, and S-1 Combined With Intraperitoneal Infusion of Paclitaxel for the Treatment of Claudin 18.2-positive Gastric Cancer With Peritoneal Metastasis

identified_line.line: 1. Histologically confirmed gastric adenocarcinoma with her 2 (-), and without the history of resection of primary or metastatic lesion;

criterions.exact_snippets: without the history of resection of primary or metastatic lesion

and_criteria.exact_snippets: without the history of resection of primary or metastatic lesion

identified_line.line: 3. Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25%, and the proportion of positive cells greater than 50% of the cases accounted for not less than 70%);

criterions.exact_snippets: Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25% ... proportion of positive cells greater than 50% ... accounted for not less than 70%)
Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25% ... proportion of positive cells greater than 50% ... accounted for not less than 70%)
Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25% ... proportion of positive cells greater than 50% ... accounted for not less than 70%)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25% ... proportion of positive cells greater than 50% ... accounted for not less than 70%)
Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25% ... proportion of positive cells greater than 50% ... accounted for not less than 70%)
Claudin 18.2 positive (≥ 25% ... proportion of positive cells greater than 50% ... accounted for not less than 70%)

identified_line.line: 4. Age ≥ 18 years at registration;
5. Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) score ≤ 1;
6. Expected life expectancy > 3 months;
7. Adequate bone marrow, liver, and renal functions.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
2. During pregnancy, within 28 days of post parturition, or during lactation;
3. Previously received immunotherapy such as PD-1/PD-L1 and CTLA-4 or targeted therapy such as Claudin 18.2.

criterions.exact_snippets: Previously received immunotherapy such as PD-1/PD-L1 and CTLA-4
Previously received ... targeted therapy such as Claudin 18.2

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Previously received immunotherapy such as PD-1/PD-L1 and CTLA-4
Previously received ... targeted therapy such as Claudin 18.2

identified_line.line: 4. Synchronous or metachronous (within 5 years) malignancies.
5. Severe mental disease, uncontrolled epilepsy, or central nervous system disease;

6. Clinically severe (i.e. active) heart disease, such as symptomatic coronary heart disease, New York Heart Association (NYHA) class II or more severe congestive heart failure or arrhythmia requiring drug intervention, or a history of myocardial infarction in the last 12 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: New York Heart Association (NYHA) class II or more severe congestive heart failure
history of myocardial infarction in the last 12 months

or_criteria.exact_snippets: New York Heart Association (NYHA) class II or more severe congestive heart failure
history of myocardial infarction in the last 12 months

identified_line.line: 12. Known dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase (DPD) deficiency;
13. Anaphylaxis to paclitaxel or any research drug ingredient.

criterions.exact_snippets: Anaphylaxis to ... any research drug ingredient
criterions.criterion: anaphylaxis to any research drug ingredient

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Anaphylaxis to ... any research drug ingredient
or_criteria.criterion: anaphylaxis to any research drug ingredient

identified_line.line: 14. Active autoimmune disease or history of refractory autoimmune disease;
15. Subjects with hypothyroidism requiring only hormone replacement therapy and skin diseases without systemic treatment (such as vitiligo, psoriasis or alopecia) can be selected;

criterions.exact_snippets: hypothyroidism requiring only hormone replacement therapy
skin diseases without systemic treatment (such as vitiligo, psoriasis or alopecia)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: hypothyroidism requiring only hormone replacement therapy
skin diseases without systemic treatment (such as vitiligo, psoriasis or alopecia)

identified_line.line: 17. Steroid or other systemic immunosuppressive therapy was used 14 days before admission, excluding local or physiological doses of systemic glucocorticoids (eg. no more than 10mg/day of prednisone or other glucocorticoids of equivalent dose) by nasal spray, inhalation or other routes, or hormones used to prevent allergy of contrast agents;

criterions.exact_snippets: Steroid or other systemic immunosuppressive therapy was used 14 days before admission
criterions.criterion: use of steroid or systemic immunosuppressive therapy

criterions.exact_snippets: excluding local or physiological doses of systemic glucocorticoids (eg. no more than 10mg/day of prednisone or other glucocorticoids of equivalent dose)
by nasal spray, inhalation or other routes
hormones used to prevent allergy of contrast agents

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Steroid or other systemic immunosuppressive therapy was used 14 days before admission
and_criteria.criterion: use of steroid or systemic immunosuppressive therapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: excluding local or physiological doses of systemic glucocorticoids (eg. no more than 10mg/day of prednisone or other glucocorticoids of equivalent dose)
by nasal spray, inhalation or other routes

not_criteria.exact_snippets: hormones used to prevent allergy of contrast agents

identified_line.line: 18. Uncontrolled arrhythmia and myocardial infarction within 12 months before admission or active tuberculosis.

criterions.exact_snippets: myocardial infarction within 12 months before admission

and_criteria.exact_snippets: myocardial infarction within 12 months before admission

identified_line.line: 16. HIV antibody positive, active hepatitis B or C (hepatitis B: HBsAg positive and HBV DNA ≥10 copies/ml; hepatitis C: HCV antibody and HCV-RNA positive, requiring antiviral treatment at the same time);

criterions.exact_snippets: requiring antiviral treatment at the same time

and_criteria.exact_snippets: requiring antiviral treatment at the same time

identified_line.line: 2. Peritoneal metastases from gastric cancer requiring definitive diagnosis by laparoscopy, and without gastric outflow tract obstruction and intestinal obstruction; Written (signed) informed consent;
1. Confirmed of evidence of distant metastasis other than peritoneal metastasis (e.g.liver metastasis, lung metastasis, para-aortic lymph node metastasis, etc.);

criterions.exact_snippets: Confirmed of evidence of distant metastasis other than peritoneal metastasis

identified_line.line: 7. Upper gastrointestinal obstruction or abnormal physiological function or malabsorption syndrome may affect S-1 absorbers;
8. Known peripheral neuropathy (> NCI-CTC AE 1). However, patients with only disappearance of deep tendon reflex (DTR) need not be excluded;
9. Patients on steroid or immunosuppressant treatment after organ transplant;
10. Patients with severe uncontrolled recurrent infections or other severe uncontrolled concomitant disease;
11. Moderate or severe renal damage [creatinine clearance ≤ 50 ml/min], or serum creatinine > upper limit of normal (ULN), 115 μmol/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: serum creatinine > upper limit of normal (ULN)

or_criteria.exact_snippets: serum creatinine > upper limit of normal (ULN)
